China Adventure — May 2026

Shanghai to Beijing via Zhangjiajie Avatar Mountains

A 12-14 day journey across China starting in Shanghai, venturing to the stunning Avatar Mountains of Zhangjiajie, and finishing in Beijing. Experience classic sights, scenic high-speed train rides, ancient water towns, and dramatic mountain landscapes.

✨ Special Opportunity

Visa-free travel in 2026! China has extended visa-free stays up to 15 days for many countries including the Netherlands and Romania.

Duration
12-14 days
Budget
€3,425 – €5,105
Travelers
2 people
